name: Hop Ball Star
description:
Hop Ball Star is most addictive and entertaining physics based Roller Bowling game ever made!
Swipe your finger to roll the ball into different holes with designated points. In game has high quality 3d graphics and quality physics will make the ball move, roll and bounce with great realism.
Game Features:
- Classic nine balls game
- 5 different machine styles
- Awesome 3D looking graphics
- Addictive game play
